constituent: corridor, cave, son, halo, good, drop, silver, city walls
koohiiStory1: Your son plays in the corridor pretending he´s exploring a cave.
koohiiStory2: (ロウ) I think of the corridor found in the cave that Yoda made Luke Skywalker walk through as part of his Jedi training in Empire Strikes Back. It was in this corridor that Luke met Darth Vadar, cut off his head and found himself behind Darth Vadar´s mask. An early little hint that Luke was Darth Vadar´s son.
